title: vidBoard.ai
introduction: AI-generated videos offer a wide range of features that enhance creativity, efficiency, and accessibility in content creation. vidBoard.ai is a robust artificial intelligence platform for making films from text, offering AI-driven video generation, ready-to-use AI templates for designs, music search, engaging captions, and Pro Avatar for online presence enhancement.
features: Create videos by using text, chat GPT, and audio script
AI-driven video generation: Just choose the subject and get astounding video with vidBoard AI
Use background images from different popular platforms
Enhance viewer experience with engaging captions for your AI-generated video
Elevate your online presence with a Pro Avatar that goes beyond static images, adding gestures for a more immersive digital identity

faqs.question: How can I subscribe to a plan on vidBoard?
faqs.answer: You can select any one of the plans available on the pricing page and pay the subscription amount. Once you have made the payment, you will receive a confirmation email and your account will be activated.

targetPeople: Content creators, marketers, educators, and individuals interested in AI-generated video production
